item.description:
I'd like to watch "What the BLEEP do we know?" and discuss. I'd like to order out for pizza and eat (in addition to the popcorn for the movie). Feel free to bring your own edibles, etc if you like. And feel free to bring up any other ideas on your mind once we've exhausted the movie discussion.

Here are additional directions to get to 308 West Lebanon Road in Lebanon. This is Brian's house...

Coming from the north on 95: Take the biddiford( rt111) exit and turn Right
onto Rt 111 heading to Sanford. This eventually turns into Rt 202 in Alfred.
Stay on Rt 202 through Sanford. Continue past the intersection of 202/109
and go Two more traffic lights(approx 10miles) At the second traffic light
Hometown Mobile will be on your left just beyond the intersection. Turn
Right onto the West Lebanon Road. Go Approx 2 miles. # 308 on the left.

Coming from South/NH: Take Rt 16 north. Take Exit 16/Rochester. Follow the
signs(turning Right) towards Sanford/Rt 202. Stay on 202 through East
Rochester. Once you cross the bridge (Welcome to Maine) Go to the first
Traffic light. Hometown Moble will be on your Right. Turn left onto the West
Labnon Road. Go Approx 2 miles. #308 on Left.
item.how_to_find_us: Seeing as how there is a toasty woodstove at this home, I won't be wearing my usual striped scarf. I think I'll put a red balloon out on the mail box though, to help...
item.name: March Meetup
